name: Side Story - BROKEN LAYERS
description:
A child saw sparkles in her room; her mother panicked.

A short story from  an upcoming bigger one.

CREDITS:

  • written by Gabin JIRODET
  • illustrated by Charlotte ADAMOWICZ & Gabin JIRODET
  • additional programing by Charlotte ADAMOWICZ
  • music by Simon VIMORT
  • made with INKY.
